videos.description: Jon introduces Instant Upload with a few thoughts on how we remember the things that matter. Check out some ways we've been rethinking real-life sharing for the web at plus.google.com
videos.title: Instant Upload

videos.description: With Google+ Instant Upload, every picture you take on your phone is instantly backed up to a private Google+ album. It's a simple way to make sure you never lose another memory.
videos.title: New Dad

videos.description: Laugh, share news, celebrate, learn something new or stay in touch with Hangouts. And with Hangouts on your phone, you can drop in from wherever you are.
videos.title: Say more with Hangouts

videos.description: Search on Google+ helps you get advice from the people you know -- sometimes when you least expect it. Check out some ways we've been rethinking real-life sharing for the web at plus.google.com.
videos.title: Google+ Search

videos.description: New ways of sharing the right things with the right people. Join at http://google.com/+
videos.title: Sharing but like real life

videos.description: Jed introduces Circles with a few thoughts on the nature of friendship. Check out some ways we've been rethinking real-life sharing for the web at plus.google.com.
videos.title: Google+ Circles

videos.description: Aimee introduces Hangouts with a few thoughts on the spontaneous get-together. Check out some ways we've been rethinking real-life sharing for the web at plus.google.com.
videos.title: Google+ Hangouts
